  • Constructor Details

    • FileMessage

      public FileMessage(UserInfo sender, File file, FileType fileType, String caption) throws IOException
      This constructor initializes the message. It needs the senders' info and an instance of a File. For the client to be able to know what kind of file this message contains, you need to specify the type of the file with FileType. You can also add a caption. If this is null, then this message contains no caption.
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender of the message
      file - the image of the message
      fileType - The text of the message. If null, no text is included.
      caption - the caption that comes with te file
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      • File
      • FileType
